author: ajsutton
content: G√∂rli is particularly difficult to predict because the difficulty doubles or halves between individual blocks. And because of the way Clique forbids signers from proposing blocks too often (even if it should be their turn) it has a tendency to go through phases where most blocks have a difficulty of 1 or more have a difficulty of 2.

author: ajsutton
content: So a single signer going offline or coming back online can shift the whole balance of who can vote in turn and whether it's a 1 difficulty or a 2.
